#### Logical Operators

```{r}
a
b
a > 2
a > 5
a >= 5

#a => 5   an error

a == b  ## `==` means "is equal to"
```

#### And and Or

```{r}
## and
TRUE & TRUE
TRUE & FALSE
FALSE & TRUE
FALSE & FALSE

## or (inclusive or)
TRUE | TRUE
TRUE | FALSE
FALSE | TRUE
FALSE | FALSE

myFavoriteNumber

(myFavoriteNumber > 10) | (myFavoriteNumber + 2 < 13)

!TRUE

!FALSE

!(10 > 12)
```
